# Images Directory

Place your images here. You can organize them in subdirectories if needed.

## Usage

Reference images in your Markdown files like this:

```markdown
![Alt text](/assets/images/your-image.jpg)
```

Or in HTML:

```html
<img src="/assets/images/your-image.jpg" alt="Description">
```

## Recommended Image Formats

- JPEG for photos
- PNG for graphics with transparency
- SVG for logos and icons
- WebP for modern browsers (with fallbacks)

## Optimization Tips

- Compress images before uploading
- Use appropriate dimensions for web
- Consider using responsive images for different screen sizes
